high_descs: Turn right and walk to the coffee table.
Pick up the newspaper from the coffee table.
Turn right and walk to the end table between the couch and the green chair.
Turn on the lamp on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Look at a newspaper under the light of a lamp.

high_descs: turn right, take a step to the coffee table
pick up the newspaper that is on the coffee table
turn right, take a step, turn left, take a step, turn right, walk to small table with lamp, hold newspaper in front of lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a newspaper with the lamp

high_descs: turn right and walk to the coffee table just up ahead
grab the news paper off of the coffee table there
turn right and walk over to the small desk to the right of the couch
turn on the lamp on the small desk there
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a newspaper
